author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Automatically creates text and voice channels from Discord Scheduled Events with customizable timing, cleanup, and dynamic voice channel creation based on role membership.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data. It only stores guild-level configuration and event-to-channel mappings.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EventChannels! Use `[p]ecset` to configure the cog, then create Discord events to see automatic channel creation in action.
name: EventChannels
short: Auto-create channels from Discord Scheduled Events with cleanup.
